backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining health check, authorization mixin, user approval, data models, and maps for designs and orders.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a parser update for Master Designs Excel import and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling asset caching, fetch interception, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router layout handling authentication, bootstrap flow, error states, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Component showing an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen displayed when bootstrap fails, offering retry, logout, and error detail display.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Displays a screen for authenticated users without profiles, showing their principal ID with copy support and instructions to contact an administrator.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial admin setup allowing the first user to enter their name and trigger profile creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Wraps protected content and only renders children if the current user's role is allowed; otherwise shows an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with technical details and options to reload or clear session.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel displaying raw technical error details with a copy-to-clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error component showing a message, optional retry button, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides a dropdown menu to export order data in multiple formats using the ordersExport utility.
Main application layout with role-based navigation, responsive mobile menu, and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog for adding or editing master design mappings, handling form state and saving via mutation.
Dialog component that handles selecting, parsing, previewing, and importing master design files, showing created/updated counts and errors.
Displays a table of master designs with edit and activation toggles, calling mutations to update active status.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Shows a preview of ingested orders with unmapped design detection, karigar validation, and order details.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar for orders allowing karigar, date range, CO-only, and status filtering with clear/reset behavior.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Renders a detailed orders table with optional status update controls and formatted order fields.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Compact indicator showing backend reachability status, canister ID, refresh control, and expandable error/details panel.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending sync count, offering a manual sync button when online.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs backend health checks using a safe actor and classifies errors to determine online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with status tracking and dynamic button labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile via a safe actor, handling auth errors and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for orders, master designs, unmapped codes, and related mutations using a safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates an actor with timeout and safe initialization logic, handling identity changes and non-retryable errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type, converts them to CSV, and triggers a download with a type-based filename.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master designs using normalized codes, preserving existing karigar names and returning mapped and unmapped results.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics including totals and karigar-wise breakdowns.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats a karigar name, returning 'Unassigned' when empty or whitespace.
Determines if an order type indicates a customer order by checking for 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from an Excel workbook using flexible header matching.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel workbook with strict required columns and validation.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS if needed and reads an Excel file into a validated workbook.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Parses master design files, routing to PDF or Excel parsers with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files from PDF or Excel using corresponding extractors and parsers.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js from CDN and extracts page text into structured lines by grouping text items by coordinates.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses flattened PDF text lines to extract master design entries by identifying headers and splitting rows into design fields.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using either table-row format or section-header format, building Order objects with timestamps.
Attempts to parse a single PDF line as a structured order row with explicit karigar column and validated numeric fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, sync queue, and metadata with basic CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that syncs queued offline ingestions to backend, updates metadata, and invalidates queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin order metrics filtered by date, handles loading and error states, and shows detailed orders with export actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Fetches and filters master design mappings, provides search, add, import, and edit capabilities, and displays results in a table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Allows admins to create user profiles by entering principal IDs and role details with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows a karigar's assigned orders with derived metrics and a table supporting status updates.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, background pattern, and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Initializes the first admin user via a bootstrap token and triggers actor reinitialization before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Parses uploaded order files, applies master design mappings, previews mapped/unmapped orders, and uploads parsed orders with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Dashboard page that loads orders, applies filters and sorting, and displays them with export and upload actions.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes grouped by code with search and a dialog to add master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister, network, or generic types and extracts safe error details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Converts errors into user-friendly messages using bootstrap error classification and safe string extraction.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to Excel import header handling and backend canister reliability.
